diary.title: Meal Planning and Nutrient Tracking
diary.subtitle: Add recipes to your diary with the click of a button. Adjust the amount, add or remove ingredients; planning ahead and living in the moment have never been easier.
diary.list.1: Organize your diary by time of day or create custom meals for grouping.
diary.list.2: Adjust daily recommended doses based on your individual circumstances.
diary.list.3: Favorites make it even faster to add food that you eat often.
diary.list.4: Use templates to build a meal plan for an entire week with one push of a button.
diary.list.5: Never lose data: The diary stays organized even after years of adjusting ingredients and deleting or renaming recipes.

food.title: Detailed Food Database
food.subtitle: Search hundreds of foods and compare macro nutrients, minerals, and vitamins.
food.list.1: The database tracks more than 35 nutrients, including different types of fats and carbs.
food.list.2: Every new entry is verified with official international food databases.
food.list.3: Quality over quantity: Unprocessed, natural foods make up most of the database.
jumbo.title: The Complete Food Tracking Solution
jumbo.subtitle: From frying pan to shopping cart, HeyApple provides everything you need to track nutrients and plan your meals.
jumbo.diary.head: Meal Planner
jumbo.diary.intro: Plan and track your meals, set nutrient targets, analyze the data
jumbo.food.head: Food Database
jumbo.food.intro: Find the food that fits your macros and more than 30 other nutrients
jumbo.recipe.head: Recipe Manager
jumbo.recipe.intro: Create your own cookbook, share it if you like, get inspired by others
jumbo.shop.head: Shopping List
jumbo.shop.intro: Automatic shopping lists make every grocery run a walk in the park
more.title: More Goodies
more.apps.head: There's an app for that
more.apps.body: We have dedicated apps for every major OS and browser. You can even write your own!
more.donate.head: ...but doesn't have to be
more.donate.body: If you want to support HeyApple development, you can donate to the development fund.
more.free.head: It's free...
more.free.body: You don't have to pay anything to use all of HeyApple's features.
more.privacy.head: Private by design
more.privacy.body: We respect your privacy and keep the collection of personal data to a minimum. We don't even ask your name!
more.quality.head: Quality information
more.quality.body: All nutrients are verified before they make it into the database.
more.source.head: Make it your own
more.source.body: HeyApple is released under the AGPL. You can inspect the code, contribute, or fork it at any time.
recipe.title: Your Favorite Recipes
recipe.subtitle: Create recipes to stay on top of your nutrient targets. Or just because you like cooking.
recipe.list.1: Add instructions and preparation times to your favorite meals.
recipe.list.2: Recipes track whether they're vegan or dairy, and what types of meat they contain.
recipe.list.3: Share your recipes with selected users or make them public for the whole world to see.
shop.title: Automatic Shopping Lists
shop.subtitle: See what you need to buy on your next run to the store at a single glance. No need to maintain separate lists or use multiple apps.
shop.list.1: Select the days you want to shop for to let the list update automatically.
shop.list.2: Sort items by name or aisle.
shop.list.3: Create custom shopping lists for non-food items.
